cannot_connect.text: Cannot connect to our server to check the new version, please check the Internet connection and try again.

cannot_copy.text: Cannot do the following copying due to the destination folder is a subfolder of the selected folder.

cannot_move.text: Cannot do the following moving due to the destination folder is a subfolder of the selected folder.

cannot_move2.text: Cannot do the following moving due to the destination is the source folder.

cannot_rename.text: Cannot do this renaming, possible reasons are: 1. This resource is in use. 2. You have not enough permission to rename it. 3. The new resource name already exists in the same path.

check_again.text: You have checked the parent folder of this one, do not need to check it again.

checking_new.text: Checking the latest version, please wait...

congratulation.text: Congratulations! Registered license successfully, thank you for your support!

copied_path.text: The selected path(s) have been put into system Clipboard successfully!

copy_1tp.text: Copies the checked resources to other location <Ctrl+C>.

copy_res1.text: Select the place where you want to copy checked resources.

del_right.text: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the checked resources (right list)?

error_key.text: Please input the correct license key.

free_key.text: Get free license key via translation

input_again.text: Please input the name again (for confirmation):

input_key_prompt.text: If you have purchased a license, please input or paste the license key EXACTLY as shown in the license eMail.

invalid_char1.text: The resource name can't contain any of the following characters: \/:*?"<>|

move_1tp.text: Moves the checked resources to other location <Ctrl+M>.

move_res1.text: Select the place where you want to move checked resources.

new_ver_found.text: New version found, please click <OK> to exit software, view the update and download the latest version, to abandon upgrading, please click <Cancel>.

no_check.text: No available checked resource for this action.

no_new_ver.text: No available new version for upgrading.

no_removed.text: This resource no longer exists and will be removed from here:

no_upgrade.text: Your license key cannot be used to upgrade product version, do you want to purchase a new license now?

not_drive.text: This software uses the checked resource(s) for Deleting, Moving and Copying operations in batch mode, but these actions are not available for a drive. So, you cannot check a drive.

ot_limit.text: You can only see the size of resources for top 3 levels.

path_res.text: Copies the full path of the highlighted resource to the Clipboard <F4>.

pro_res.text: Displays the properties of the highlighted resource <Alt+Enter>.

rb_1tp.text: Moves the checked resources to the Recycle Bin <Del>.

rb_right.text: Are you sure you want to move the checked resources (right list) to Recycle Bin?

reload_tree.text: This action will reset whole resources tree, are you sure to continue?

reload5.text: The data separator or 'Show CD / Network Drive(s)' option is changed, to see the effect, you must reload whole resources tree, do you want to reload it now?

reload6.text: Now, you must reload whole resources tree to see the size of 4+ levels, do you want to reload it now?

remove_right.text: Are you sure you want to remove the selected resources from right list (do NOT delete any resource from your disk actually)?

rom.text: Cannot do this for the following item due to it is stored in a ROM drive.

set_proxy.text: Please note that if you get the Internet connection through a proxy server, you must set the proxy in Microsoft Web Browser.

twes.text: Member of TriSun Software Windows Explorer solution
